column1: The '''father-name''' was the name given to an [[Elves|Elf]] at or near birth by his or her father
column2: and was considered one of his or her 'true names'. It is one of the '''[[essë#anessi|anessi]]'''
column5: along with the '''[[amilessë]]''' ("mother-name") and '''[[epessë]]''' ("after-name" or honorific). The father-name was a public name
column7: p. 216</ref> It was often the primary name of an Elf until he or she chose to adopt an epessë given to them.<ref>{{PM|Shibboleth}}
